Welcome aboard the China Clipper II. Filty years ago today, the China
Clipper, a Pan Am Martin M-130 flying boat, taxied out into the harbor of
San Francisco Bay and took off trailing a large wake of sea spray. Bands
play and haas wed. Cheerina crois kned the shores A bodilla of

Clipper. Recognizing the significance of the moment, President Franklin
D) Pooseuel sent a special message "convenna heartielt congratulations
Today we commemorate this historic tight by retracing the route of the
China Clipper aboard a Boeing 747 Jet Clipper. The fight of the China
Clipper I not only celebrates past achievements, but serves as a reminder
of the advances made in aviation. We pay tribute to the indidual and
collective efforts of the men and women who pioneered Pan Am's air
routes across the Pacific. We are honored that you are joining Fan Am on

PACIFIC OCEAN
n November 22, 1935 at 3:46 pm (local time), the China
Clipper took off from the Pan American operating base at
Alameda altomia enronto to mania. The route nac
previously been charted by survey missions flown by Pan
Am. The 8,210-mile journey included stops in Honolulu.
Midway. Wake and Guam Islands, arriving in Manila exactly on schedule
on November 29 Total elansed time was 6 davs. 7 hours and 46 minutes
Total flying time was 59 hours, 48 minutes.
The China Choper had a crew of seven with Pan Ams veteran chiet
pilot Captain Edwin C. Musick in command. This first transpacific airmail
flight carried 58 bags of mail with 110,865 letters bound for Honolulu,
